sentences.en: Because struct s are implicitly sealed, they cannot be inherited.
sentences.cn: 由于结构是隐式密封的, 因此它们不能被继承.

sentences.en: Ensure that implicitly associated labels for form controls are properly positioned.
sentences.cn: 请确保表单控件的隐式关联标签放置正确.

sentences.en: Hence, traffic information about the charged road sections is implicitly collected.
sentences.cn: 因此, 有关收费路段的交通信息是含蓄地收集.

sentences.en: I can trust Mr. Somerville implicitly, I suppose?
sentences.cn: 我想, 我可以毫无保留地信任萨莫维尔先生 吧 ?

sentences.en: It does influence the calculated probabilities implicitly.
sentences.cn: 它无疑影响着计算的概率.

sentences.en: Long - string variables, for instance, are implicitly pointers, as are class variables.
sentences.cn: 例如, 长串变量就是隐式指针, 类变量也是.

sentences.en: Many verbs and many words of other kinds are implicitly causal.
sentences.cn: 许多动词和许多其他类词都蕴涵着因果关系.
她暗地很信任这位医生.

sentences.en: The hierarchy implicitly defines the multicast overlay data paths.
sentences.cn: 这个分层结构隐式的定义了覆盖层组播的数据转发路径.

sentences.en: There was something in the mind of Robert Kincaid that understood all of this, implicitly.
sentences.cn: 而罗伯特.金凯的头脑中有某种东西对这一切心领神会.

sentences.en: This short - circuiting implicitly gives the highest priority to the leftmost alternative.
sentences.cn: 这种短路行为隐式地给予最左边的选项以最高优先级.

sentences.en: Where forward markets exist, rates of interest in real terms are always implicitly established.
sentences.cn: 在有期货市场存在的地方, 实质上的利率常常已在暗中建立.

sentences.en: You promised to obey me implicitly.
sentences.cn: 你答应过要照我说的去做的.

trans.tran_cn: 含蓄地，暗示地，无疑问地，无保留地
